{{Description|An elite agent among the Fatui possessing extraordinary skill and an indomitable will.|[[Adventurer Handbook]]}}
'''Fatui Operatives''' are an [[Elite Enemy|elite]] enemy group found in [[Fontaine]]. They are servants of [[The Knave|Arlecchino]] and part of her special force of elite operatives.<ref>[[Version 4.1]] Special Program: [https://youtu.be/NUBIYZ_KQFc 26:05]</ref>

In combat, they can use their Hunt Down skill to apply [[Bond of Life]] and [[Corrosion]] to characters they hit, sacrificing some of their health in the process. Upon a successful first hit, they will perform additional follow-up attacks. Hunt Down deals greatly increased DMG to characters affected by the Life Bond.
